name: Jumping Dino Game
description:
Quick little project inspired by an artwork I saw on reddit the other day:
https://www.reddit.com/r/Art/comments/lyyr5m/land_before_wifi_me_digital_paintin...

Controls:
Jump: Space / UpArrow / LeftClick
Duck: DownArrow / RightClick

Artists work here:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/g2L9Ke
